lexUnit.name: sum up.v

corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

lexUnit.definition: FN: to summarize a State_or_affairs (note: this is the transitive usage e.g. "I'll sum up what he said...")

sentence.text: There 's a picture that sums up perfectly how I want the woodland to look . "

She once summed up to a gathering of marketing specialists the extent of her success , which earned The Body Shop the award of business of the year in 1987 :

He has summed up the issue much better than I could .

On this last day I want to sum up the things we have discussed .
